Module gmit.software

Package ie.gmit.sw

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Spriteable
    Abstract interface for abstracting the sprites from the sprite factory.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultSprite
    Class is used for defining information about DefaultSprite.
    GameController
    This class controls the gameplay needed for game interaction.
    GameView  
    GameWindow  
    GreenSprite
    Class is used for defining information about GreenSprite.
    ImageController
    Class is used for controlling images by reading them in and returning the images, keeps SRP.
    IsoViewController
    This class is used for controlling and setting up the isometric view.
    PersonSprite
    Class is used for defining information about PersonSprite.
    PlayerController
    This class is used for controlling the player via a keylistener.
    PlayerSprite
    Class is used for defining information about PlayerSprite.
    Point
    Class is used to get and set point coordinate.
    Properties
    Class is used for obtaining properties in correspondence with sprite/object images and grid tiles.
    Runner
    This class is used for running the program.
    SpriteFactory
    This class uses the factory design pattern for creating and instantiating multiple sprites.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
